title: MD
biography: The Kelly M. West Award for Outstanding Achievement in Epidemiology is an honor bestowed by the American Diabetes Association. It has been awarded annually to an individual since 1986. The award is named in honor of Kelly M. West.
aiSummary: Jaakko Tuomilehto is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 171. Has been published in Nature, New England Journal of Medicine, Nature Genetics. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Unknown.
